issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The described issue is not actually a problem - it is as designed.
resolution.name: Not A Problem

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: When log aggregation fails to create the application log directory it kills the application.  This apparently can leave the container with no log directory, as the user encounters a 500 error when trying to access the AM logs via the webapp.
fields.summary: NM webapp returns 500 error when container log directory is missing

comments.body:
Stacktrace from NM log:

It doesn't seem to be a problem anymore with the changes happened. [~jlowe], can you confirm to close this issue?
I agree this has been fixed at some point and is no longer a problem.
